text: avaṉ vāṉaṅkaḷaiyum, pūmiyaiyum uṇmaiyaik koṇṭu paṭaittirukkiṟāṉ; avaṉē pakaliṉ mītu iravaic cuṟṟukiṟāṉ; iṉṉum iraviṉ mītu pakalaic cuṟṟukiṟāṉ; cūriyaṉaiyum cantiraṉaiyum (taṉ ātikkattiṟkuḷ) vacappaṭuttiṉāṉ, ivai ovvoṉṟum kuṟippiṭaṭa tavaṇaip pirakāram naṭakkiṉṟatu; (napiyē!)
